document_data.name: Sharp Fangs
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sharp Fangs''' were a tribe of [[goblin]]s that inhabited the [[Orsraun Mountains]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Their members typically wielded [[short sword]]s and rode upon the backs of [[worg]]s.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], the Sharp Fangs were allied with the [[Muktar]]an empire and fought for them in their [[Turmish]] war at the [[Battle of Wilna Pass]].
